name: escrow_deposit_action_059
body: token :: burn (CpiContext :: new_with_signer (ctx . accounts . token_program . to_account_info () , Burn { mint : ctx . accounts . mint . to_account_info () , to : ctx . accounts . escrow_deposit_src_059 . to_account_info () , authority : ctx . accounts . auth . to_account_info () } , & [& [b"escrow_deposit" , & [ctx . bumps ["auth"]]]]) , amount ,) ? ;
let mut st = & mut ctx . accounts . state ;
st . count = st . count . checked_add (amount) . unwrap_or (st . count) ;
